name: Christmas Carnage
description:
Fun winter themed party game, a team of elves vs a team of demons fight to reach either Krampus or Santa and win the game. 

Controls:

Esc to quit.

Keyboard:

(Player 1)

A: move left

D: move right

Space: jump

F: Throw snowball

(Player 2)

Arrow keys: move left and right

Up arrow: jump

?/: Swing axe

Controller:

Left stick: move left / right

Bottom button (Xbox A, Playstation X): Jump

Left button (Xbox X, Playstation Square): Throw snowball / Swing axe
